tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The procedure right from entering hospital corridor the concerned staff took charge of the patient (myself) with at most care took me to the emergency ward & learned how, what & when it had happened also presently what's happening this discussion made me very calm & confident that everything will be fine very soon & it happened accordingly, from thereon my BP was normal when they checked it. After surgery doctor 's, nurses & other supporting staff was good by attending the patient (myself)for his need like checking temperature/BP/Sugar/Food/medicine & cleaning the room & etc., really I felt it was my Home.
By Experiencing the above my advice if any one who need of any medical treatment try to reach SPARSH Hospital Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore-22.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We consulted the doctor for Diabetic charcot Orthoneuropathy, which my mother in law is suffering from. Doctor is extremely confident and well educated with multiple master degrees abroad. He has done about 80 surgeries for the same condition till date in Sparsh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is my personal experience i had  at Sparsh hospital at yeshwanthpur due to my left leg lumbar spine problem caused severe left leg pain , then consulted Dr. Ananya puttaraju at Sparsh hospital.A very good infrastructure and facility for the people of Bangalore north. And well qualified team of specialised docotrs in all areas. 
Dr.Ananya sir, is very good & right attitude doctor and very friendly & excellent in analysing the cause and explaining the problem to patients. 
And the way he concluded the solutions with various options is excellent,
This hospital & doctors suggests treatment or surgery according to sevearity of the patient  condition.
I recommend 100%  to visit sparsh hospital for the one stop facility & consult Dr.Ananya puttaraju  for anykind of orthopedic diseases.
I am very much satisfied.

Prasanna kumar Gowda

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Osteoarthritis Of The Knee,Joint Pain,Knee replacement,
review: Took my mother to Dr. Ananya for knee replacement surgery. He patiently listened to my mother for 20 minutes and explained the need for surgery and procedure in detail. Post surgery he and his team visited daily and checked on her progression. Due to anxiety she would ask a lot of questions and Dr Ananya and his team had answered all of them with lot of patience. Overall, we are very satisfied with his treatment.
